title: CN Level 9 â€” Performance & Troubleshooting
intro: This level focuses on latency, packet loss and simple troubleshooting.
points: Know common causes of high latency and packet loss.
Basic use of tools like ping and traceroute (concept).
Recognize impact of bandwidth vs congestion.
Understand how DNS or routing issues can break connectivity.
Approach to troubleshooting: isolate layers and components.
